alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Aitkin; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 9:59AM CDT until April 05 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area, the Grand Portage Reservation and the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...Until noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow squalls possible this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
